title: Open Source in 2025: What Will Matter Most This Year?
author: Amanda Brock
description: Navigating the pressures on the open source software world must become our collective mission in 2025, argues Amanda Brock of OpenUK.
cntitle: 2025年开源：今年最重要的将会是什么？
cndescription: 应对开源软件世界压力的挑战必须成为我们2025年的共同使命，OpenUK的Amanda Brock 认为。
